QuestData.Title: Cleaning House
QuestData.Description: That's it, $n. I've had enough of this.$b$bIf somebody doesn't do SOMETHING to take care of this brewery, we'll lose it forever. And there's far too much family history - and beer - in there to risk wasting.$b$bSo... we're going to break in through the back door. You, Li Li, Mudmug, and me.$b$bIt's gonna be a brawl in there.$b$bLet me know when you're ready.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Eddy, Jooga, and the Fizzy Yellow Alemental.
QuestData.RewardText: Take a look around - it's a lot calmer outside. All the brewery needed was somebody strong to take care of it.$b$bIt's going to take some time to clean this place up, but I don't really mind that so much.$b$bThis is, after all... my home.
